description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1a. Physical description: 21 lines per page; written in shikastah in black on machine-made paper. Leaves 105-112 are on laid paper. Rubrication in blue; marginal notes. Occasional staining and some repairs. Origin: Last ten days of Muḥarram 1294 H [February 1877], by ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ibrāhīm al-Lāhijī (leaf 187b). Incipit: قد قسمنا في صدر هذا الكتاب المكلف الملقب الى الحكم الشرعي العملي في الواقعة على ثلاثة اقسام
author: Anṣārī, Murtaḍá ibn Muḥammad Amīn, 1799 or 1800-1864
abstract: Third part of a treatise on uṣūl al-fiqh.
extent: 188 leaves : paper ; 215 x 157 (160 x 101) mm bound to 217 x 160 mm
title: al-Maqṣid al-thālith min maqāṣid hādhā al-kitāb fī al-shakk
creator: انصاري، مرتضى بن محمد امين، 1799 or 1800-1864
subject: Islamic law—Interpretation and construction—Early works to 1800
binding_note: Full brown leather with blind-stamped central mandorla, pendants, cornerpieces, and fillets.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
